mapper.select: SELECT * FROM guide WHERE LOWER(REPLACE(guide_name, ' ', '')) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{guide_name} || '%')
SELECT * FROM guide WHERE app_name = #{app_name} AND LOWER(REPLACE(guide_name, ' ', '')) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{guide_name} || '%')
SELECT * FROM guide WHERE app_name = #{keyword} OR LOWER(REPLACE(guide_name, ' ', '')) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{keyword} || '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO guide (guide_id,guide_name,app_name, registrant, regist_date, download, love) VALUES (#{guide_id},#{guide_name},#{app_name}, #{registrant}, #{regist_date}, #{download}, #{love})
